ne9:1.3: Byanjanena suttassa neruttanca adhippayo ca nidananca pubbaparasandhi ca gavesitabbo.
ne9:1.4: Tattha katamam neruttam, ya niruttipadasamhita, yam dhammanam namaso nanam.
ne9:1.5: Yada hi bhikkhu atthassa ca namam janati, dhammassa ca namam janati, tatha tatha nam abhiniropeti.
ne9:1.6: Ayanca vuccati atthakusalo dhammakusalo byanjanakusalo niruttikusalo pubbaparakusalo desanakusalo atitadhivacanakusalo anagatadhivacanakusalo paccuppannadhivacanakusalo itthadhivacanakusalo purisadhivacanakusalo napumsakadhivacanakusalo ekadhivacanakusalo anekadhivacanakusalo, evam sabbani katabbani janapadaniruttani sabba ca janapadaniruttiyo.
ne9:4.2: Ye apayehi parimuccitukama bhavissanti, te dhammacarino bhavissantiti ayam ettha bhagavato adhippayo.
ne9:6.2: Sancetanikanam katanam kammanam upacitanam dukkhavedaniyanam anittham asatam vipakam paccanubhavissatiti ayam ettha bhagavato adhippayo.
ne9:8.2: Ye sukhena atthika bhavissanti, te papakammam na karissantiti ayam ettha bhagavato adhippayo.
ne9:10.2: Ye jaramaranena attiyitukama bhavissanti, te bhavissanti bhojane mattannuno indriyesu guttadvara pubbarattapararattam jagariyanuyogamanuyutta vipassaka kusalesu dhammesu sagarava ca sabrahmacarisu theresu navesu majjhimesuti ayam ettha bhagavato adhippayo.
ne9:12.2: Ye amatapariyesanam pariyesitukama bhavissanti, te appamatta viharissantiti ayam ettha bhagavato adhippayo.
ne9:13.2: Yatha so dhaniyo gopalako bhagavantam aha—
ne9:14.4: Na hi so nandati yo nirupadhi”ti.
ne9:16.4: Na hi so socati yo nirupadhi”ti.
ne9:17.1: Imina vatthuna imina nidanena evam nayati “idha bhagava bahiram pariggaham upadhim aha”ti.
ne9:17.2: Yatha ca maro papima gijjhakuta pabbata puthusilam patesi, bhagava aha—
ne9:20.1: Imina vatthuna imina nidanena evam nayati “idha bhagava kayam upadhim aha”ti.
ne9:22.1: Imina vatthuna imina nidanena evam nayati “idha bhagava bahiresu vatthusu tanham aha”ti.
ne9:24.1: Imina vatthuna imina nidanena evam nayati “idha bhagava bahiravatthukaya tanhaya pahanam aha”ti.
ne9:26.1: Imina vatthuna imina nidanena evam nayati “idha bhagava ajjhattikavatthukaya tanhaya pahanam aha”ti.
ne9:28.1: Imina vatthuna imina nidanena evam nayati “idha bhagava ajjhattikavatthukaya tanhaya pahanam aha”ti.
ne9:33.1: Iti andhataya ca sanchannataya ca sayeva tanha abhilapita.
ne9:33.3: Yancaha ratto attham na janati, ratto dhammam na passatiti, imehi padehi pariyutthanehi sayeva tanha abhilapita.
ne9:33.4: Yam andhakaram, ayam dukkhasamudayo, ya ca tanha ponobhavika, yancaha kamati ime kilesakama.
ne9:33.5: Yancaha jalasanchannati tesamyeva kamanam payogena pariyutthanam dasseti, tasma kilesavasena ca pariyutthanavasena ca tanhabandhanam vuttam.
ne9:33.6: Ye edisika, te jaramaranam anventi, ayam bhagavata yathanikkhittagathabalena dassita jaramaranamanventiti.
ne9:35.1: Papanca nama tanhaditthimana, tadabhisankhata ca sankhara.
ne9:35.3: Sandanam nama tanhaya pariyutthanam, yani chattimsatanhaya jaliniya vicaritani.
ne9:35.5: Ye ca papanca sankhara ya ca thiti yam sandananca yam palighanca yo etam sabbam samatikkanto, ayam vuccati nittanho iti.
ne9:36.1: Tattha pariyutthanasankhara ditthadhammavedaniya va upapajjavedaniya va aparapariyavedaniya va, evam tanha tividham phalam deti ditthe va dhamme upapajje va apare va pariyaye.
ne9:36.3: “yam lobhapakatam kammam karoti kayena va vacaya va manasa va, tassa vipakam anubhoti ditthe va dhamme upapajje va apare va pariyaye”ti.
ne9:36.5: Tattha pariyutthanam ditthadhammavedaniyam va kammam upapajjavedaniyam va kammam aparapariyayavedaniyam va kammam, evam kammam tidha vipaccati ditthe va dhamme upapajje va apare va pariyaye.
ne9:37.2: micchaditthi hoti, tassa ditthe va dhamme vipakam patisamvedeti upapajje va apare va pariyaye”ti.
ne9:37.4: Tattha pariyutthanam patisankhanabalena pahatabbam, sankhara dassanabalena, chattimsa tanhavicaritani bhavanabalena pahatabbaniti evam tanhapi tidha pahiyati.
ne9:38.2: Yancaha bhagava “papanceti atitanagatapaccuppannam cakkhuvinneyyam rupam arabbha”ti.
ne9:38.4: “atite, radha, rupe anapekkho hohi, anagatam rupam ma abhinandi, paccuppannassa rupassa nibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya patinissaggaya patipajja”ti.
ne9:38.6: Yo capi papanco ye ca sankhara ya ca atitanagatapaccuppannassa abhinandana, idam ekattham.
ne9:38.7: Api ca annamannehi padehi annamannehi akkharehi annamannehi byanjanehi aparimana dhammadesana vutta bhagavata.
ne9:38.8: Evam suttena suttam samsandayitva pubbaparena saddhim yojayitva suttam niddittham bhavati.
ne9:39.1: So cayam pubbaparo sandhi catubbidho atthasandhi byanjanasandhi desanasandhi niddesasandhiti.
ne9:40.1: Tattha atthasandhi chappadani sankasana pakasana vivarana vibhajana uttanikammata pannattiti.
ne9:41.1: Byanjanasandhi chappadani akkharam padam byanjanam akaro nirutti niddesoti.
ne9:42.1: Desanasandhi na ca pathavim nissaya jhayati jhayi jhayati ca.
ne9:42.2: Na ca apam nissaya jhayati jhayi jhayati ca, na ca tejam nissaya jhayati jhayi jhayati ca, na ca vayum nissaya jhayati jhayi jhayati ca …pe… na ca akasanancayatanam nissaya … na ca vinnanancayatanam nissaya … na ca akincannayatanam nissaya … na ca nevasannanasannayatanam nissaya … na ca imam lokam nissaya … na ca paralokam nissaya jhayati jhayi jhayati ca.
ne9:42.3: Yamidam ubhayamantarena dittham sutam mutam vinnatam pattam pariyesitam vitakkitam vicaritam manasanucintitam, tampi nissaya na jhayati jhayi jhayati ca.
ne9:42.4: Ayam sadevake loke samarake sabrahmake sassamanabrahmaniya pajaya sadevamanussaya anissitena cittena na nayati jhayanto.
ne9:43.1: Yatha maro papima godhikassa kulaputtassa vinnanam samanvesanto na janati na passati.
ne9:43.2: So hi papancatito tanhapahanena ditthinissayopissa natthi.
ne9:43.3: Yatha ca godhikassa, evam vakkalissa sadevakena lokena samarakena sabrahmakena sassamanabrahmaniya pajaya sadevamanussaya anissitacitta na nayanti jhayamana.
ne9:44.2: Nissitacitta akusalapakkhena niddisitabba, anissitacitta kusalapakkhena niddisitabba.
ne9:44.3: Nissitacitta kilesena niddisitabba, anissitacitta vodanena niddisitabba.
ne9:44.4: Nissitacitta samsarappavattiya niddisitabba, anissitacitta samsaranivattiya niddisitabba.
ne9:44.5: Nissitacitta tanhaya ca avijjaya ca niddisitabba, anissitacitta samathena ca vipassanaya ca niddisitabba.
ne9:44.6: Nissitacitta ahirikena ca anottappena ca niddisitabba, anissitacitta hiriya ca ottappena ca niddisitabba.
ne9:44.7: Nissitacitta asatiya ca asampajannena ca niddisitabba, anissitacitta satiya ca sampajannena ca niddisitabba.
ne9:44.8: Nissitacitta ayoniya ca ayonisomanasikarena ca niddisitabba, anissitacitta yoniya ca yonisomanasikarena ca niddisitabba.
ne9:44.9: Nissitacitta kosajjena ca dovacassena ca niddisitabba, anissitacitta viriyarambhena ca sovacassena ca niddisitabba.
ne9:44.10: Nissitacitta assaddhiyena ca pamadena ca niddisitabba, anissitacitta saddhaya ca appamadena ca niddisitabba.
ne9:44.11: Nissitacitta asaddhammassavanena ca asamvaranena ca niddisitabba, anissitacitta saddhammassavanena ca samvarena ca niddisitabba.
ne9:44.12: Nissitacitta abhijjhaya ca byapadena ca niddisitabba, anissitacitta anabhijjhaya ca abyapadena ca niddisitabba.
ne9:44.13: Nissitacitta nivaranehi ca samyojaniyehi ca niddisitabba, anissitacitta ragaviragaya ca cetovimuttiya avijjaviragaya ca pannavimuttiya niddisitabba.
ne9:44.14: Nissitacitta ucchedaditthiya ca sassataditthiya ca niddisitabba, anissitacitta saupadisesaya ca anupadisesaya ca nibbanadhatuya niddisitabba.
